label.dataTitle: Field description showed to the user
label.inlineHelp: For example: Rate how easy it was to use this procedure
label.default: Rate how easy it was to use this procedure

amount.inlineHelp: Select amount of starts (Note only 5 is an option for this SDG form)

minValue.inlineHelp: For example: Not so easy (or leave empty to follow SDG template)

maxValue.inlineHelp: For example: Very easy (or leave empty to follow SDG template)

required.title: Require user input
required.customTitle: Add a custom message if required field is not filled in
required.customMessageTitle: This filed must have a value
required.customMessageHelpMsg: This is the message you will display to the user if they try to submit this field without any value

text.inlineHelp: The text to display on the Submit button for example: Send feedback

message.inlineHelp: The thank you text that shows after the form is submited

button.inlineHelp: The text on the confirm button
